commit.message: Add Unit test case to NacosConfigInstanceTest

nodes.bodyText: we can import static org.junit.Assert.assertThat; and use assertEquals directly, keep the same with other test class.
Blank lines need to be indented，please check.
Please use assertThat instead of assertEquals
Do not need mock if return null

The first arg of assertThat is actual, second arg is expected.
It is reversed.

It is reversed.
